DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Human Cord Blood Derived , Culture Expanded Natural Killer Cell ( PNK-007 ) Infusion With Subcutaneous Recombinant Human IL-2 ( rhIL-2 ) Adults With Relapsed and/or Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia ( AML )
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study ass safety determine maximum tolerate dose PNK-007 subject relapse and/or refractory acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) . The secondary objective explore potential clinical efficacy day 42 . Treatment plan include condition cyclophosphamide fludarabine . PNK-007 administered IV follow total six Recombinant human interleukin 2 ( rhIL-2 ) injection support NK cell body . Subjects follow 24 month .
